extendedInfo.description: Stay connected to Walters State via the Walters State Mobile App. Quickly access campus maps, course information, college news and events, the faculty and staff directory, notifications, and important office numbers. You can even exchange contact information with classmates and friends.MapsFind out where you are on campus and where your classes and the buildings theyâre in are located.CoursesView your course assignments, class rosters, grades and discussions.NewsKeep up with college news and happenings.EventsView upcoming events, such as plays and concerts.DirectorySearch the college directory to find contact information for faculty and staff.NotificationsGet instant notifications about weather-related cancellations and other important college information.ContactGet contact information for student support offices such as financial aid, tutoring, and the Student Success Center.SportsKeep up with Senators athletics.PeopleSee all the people in your network like classmates, professors, and friends. Exchange contact information to build your network of contacts.VideosWatch videos about the college.

reviews.title: Not current
reviews.comment: When I view my classes on this app, I only see the classes from fall 2011.  I don\'t even have an option to change semesters.
reviews.author: A Google User
